title: Peanut Butter Sesame Breakfast Bars Recipe
full_text:
Peanut Butter Sesame Breakfast Bars Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
40 mins
Active
10 mins
Cooling Time
35 mins
Total
80 mins
Makes
16 bars
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
honey
1
egg
, lightly beaten
1
cup
crunchy peanut butter
1/2
teaspoon
vanilla extract
1/4
cup
sesame seeds
1/2
cup
puffed rice cereal
, such as
Kashi
Directions
Preheat oven to 350°F. Place sesame seeds in a small saucepan over medium heat. Saute until toasted and golden, about 2 minutes. Let cool.
In a medium bowl, stir together honey, egg, vanilla extract, and peanut butter until evenly combined. Stir in sesame seeds and rice cereal.
Spread mixture in baking dish. Bake until golden, about 25 minutes. Let bars cool completely before cutting.
Special equipment
8 x 8-inch baking dish
